00147                 public function colorful_license()
00148                 {
00149                         $color = '#69f';
00150                         switch ($this->license) {
00151                                 case 'free software':
00152                                         $color = '#f09'; // fuchsia
00153                                         break;
00154                                 case 'freeware':
00155                                         $color = '#0c0'; // green
00156                                         break;
00157                                 case 'shareware':
00158                                         $color = '#609'; // purple
00159                                         break;                          
00160                                 case 'commercial':
00161                                         $color = '#00c'; // blue
00162                                         break;                          
00163                                 case 'demo':
00164                                         $color = '#c00'; // red
00165                                         break;                          
00166                                 case 'donationware':
00167                                         $color = '#f93'; // orange
00168                                         break;                  
00169                         }
00170                         return span(ucwords($this->license), array('style' => "font-weight:bold;color:$color"));
00171                 }
